bug.author: mironnn
bug.description: I'm trying to run a speech recognition example from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/tree/master/examples/speech_recognition>speech recognition example</denchmark-link> . But I'm getting an error: infer.py: error: argument --task: invalid choice: 'speech_recognition'

comments.comment: Can you please reopen this issue following the template? In particular, we need to know what command you ran, your environment, etc.
